content: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

content: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

content: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
author: Dalai Lama

content: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

content: Get busy living or get busy dying.
author: Stephen King

content: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

content: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.
author: Henry Ford

content: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
author: Alan Kay

content: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.
author: Mark Twain

content: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

content: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

content: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
author: Lao Tzu

content: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

content: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
author: Albert Einstein

content: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
author: Nelson Mandela

content: The unexamined life is not worth living.
author: Socrates

content: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
author: Aristotle

content: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
author: Oprah Winfrey

content: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

content: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

content: Everything you can imagine is real.
author: Pablo Picasso

content: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
author: Tony Robbins

content: What we think, we become.
author: Buddha

content: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

content: The future belongs to those who prepare for it today.
author: Malcolm X

content: The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
author: Plato

content: Well done is better than well said.
author: Benjamin Franklin

content: If you judge people, you have no time to love them.
author: Mother Teresa

content: Not all those who wander are lost.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

content: Knowledge is power.
author: Francis Bacon

content: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
author: Robert Frost

content: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

content: Try not to become a man of success but rather a man of value.

content: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

content: If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door.
author: Milton Berle

content: I think, therefore I am.
author: René Descartes

content: What we fear doing most is usually what we most need to do.
author: Tim Ferriss

content: If you are going through hell, keep going.

content: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

content: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

content: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra

content: Life isn’t about finding yourself. It’s about creating yourself.
author: George Bernard Shaw

content: You must do the things you think you cannot do.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

content: What you do speaks so loudly that I cannot hear what you say.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

content: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Nelson Mandela

content: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

content: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act but a habit.
author: Aristotle

content: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
author: Confucius

content: Do one thing every day that scares you.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

content: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
author: Albert Einstein

content: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
author: Mae West

content: The greatest wealth is health.
author: Virgil

content: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.

content: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

content: The biggest risk is not taking any risk.
author: Mark Zuckerberg

content: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
author: Suzy Kassem

content: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

content: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
author: Confucius

content: The time is always right to do what is right.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

content: To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often.
author: Winston Churchill

content: The more I read, the more I acquire, the more certain I am that I know nothing.
author: Voltaire

content: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

content: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
author: George Eliot

content: You become what you believe.
author: Oprah Winfrey

content: If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough.
author: Albert Einstein

content: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

content: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

content: The truth will set you free.
author: Jesus Christ

content: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
author: William Butler Yeats

content: The future starts today, not tomorrow.
author: Pope John Paul II

content: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
author: Albert Einstein

content: It always seems impossible until it is done.
author: Nelson Mandela

content: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
author: George Addair

content: A smooth sea never made a skilled sailor.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

content: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.

content: The best dreams happen when you’re awake.

content: Dream big and dare to fail.
author: Norman Vaughan

content: Limit your 'always' and your 'nevers'.

content: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
author: John Muir

content: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

content: Turn obstacles into opportunities.
author: Colin Powell

content: Peace begins with a smile.
author: Mother Teresa

content: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
author: Aristotle

content: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
author: David Viscott

content: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

content: We accept the love we think we deserve.
author: Stephen Chbosky

content: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
author: Socrates

content: Do small things with great love.
author: Mother Teresa

content: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
author: Oscar Wilde

content: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

content: You cannot shake hands with a clenched fist.
author: Indira Gandhi

content: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.

content: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

content: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
author: Aristotle

content: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.
author: Sarah Louise Delany

content: To handle yourself, use your head; to handle others, use your heart.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

content: The best way out is always through.
author: Robert Frost

content: You become responsible forever for what you have tamed.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

content: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
author: Benjamin Franklin

content: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.

content: Do not let making a living prevent you from making a life.
author: John Wooden

content: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
author: Helen Keller

content: Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.
author: Seneca

content: You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them.
author: Michael Jordan

content: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

content: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
author: Napoleon Hill

content: Where there is love there is life.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

content: Life is made of ever so many partings welded together.
author: Charles Dickens

content: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, some are strong at the broken places.
author: Ernest Hemingway

content: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

content: What is now proved was once only imagined.
author: William Blake

content: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

content: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.

content: We don’t stop playing because we grow old; we grow old because we stop playing.
author: George Bernard Shaw

content: Life is either great or terrible, depending on your attitude.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

content: Courage is grace under pressure.
author: Ernest Hemingway

content: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

content: The greatest step toward a life of simplicity is to learn to let go.
author: Steve Maraboli

content: The only source of knowledge is experience.
author: Albert Einstein

content: The greatest pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do.
author: Walter Bagehot

content: Nothing will work unless you do.
author: Maya Angelou

content: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
author: Oscar Wilde

content: You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
author: Maya Angelou

content: Life is too important to be taken seriously.
author: Oscar Wilde

content: Dream as if you'll live forever; live as if you'll die today.

content: A room without books is like a body without a soul.
author: Cicero

content: The only journey is the one within.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

content: Being entirely honest with oneself is a good exercise.
author: Sigmund Freud

content: Patience is also a form of action.
author: Auguste Rodin

content: The only way to have a friend is to be one.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

content: Life is a flower of which love is the honey.
author: Victor Hugo

content: Freedom lies in being bold.
author: Robert Frost

content: The meaning of life is to give life meaning.

content: The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.
author: Mary Pickford

content: Life isn't about waiting for the storm to pass but learning to dance in the rain.
author: Vivian Greene

content: The more you know, the more you realize you know nothing.
author: Socrates

content: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.

content: Stay hungry, stay foolish.
author: Steve Jobs

content: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
author: Steve Jobs

content: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
author: Buddha

content: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
author: William Shakespeare

content: We know what we are but know not what we may be.
author: William Shakespeare

content: To thine own self be true.
author: William Shakespeare

content: The fault, dear Brutus, is not in our stars, but in ourselves.
author: William Shakespeare

content: Boldness be my friend.
author: William Shakespeare

content: Life is better when you're laughing.
author: Unknown

content: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

content: Courage is not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it.

content: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.

content: No pressure, no diamonds.

content: If you want peace, prepare for war.
author: Vegetius

content: Not everything that is faced can be changed, but nothing can be changed until it is faced.

content: The eyes are the window to your soul.
author: William Shakespeare

content: Don't compromise yourself. You are all you've got.

content: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one’s courage.

content: Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye.

content: Whatever you are, be a good one.
author: Abraham Lincoln

content: Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

content: Where there is no vision, there is no hope.
author: George Washington Carver

content: If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together.

content: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
author: Confucius

content: If you are not willing to risk the unusual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.

content: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
author: Will Rogers

content: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

content: A wise man changes his mind, a fool never will.
author: Spanish Proverb

content: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.

content: A happy life consists in the tranquility of mind.
author: Cicero

content: We become what we behold.
author: Marshall McLuhan

content: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
author: Confucius

content: The measure of who we are is what we do with what we have.

content: Everything happens for a reason.
author: Aristotle

content: Do not go gentle into that good night.
author: Dylan Thomas

content: The purpose of life is a life of purpose.
author: Robert Byrne

content: Life is a long lesson in humility.
author: James M. Barrie

content: Fortune favors the bold.
author: Virgil

content: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.

content: The world is full of magic things, patiently waiting for our senses to grow sharper.
author: W.B. Yeats

content: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
author: Oscar Wilde

content: We are made of star-stuff.
author: Carl Sagan

content: Science is the poetry of reality.
author: Richard Dawkins

content: You must do the thing you think you cannot do.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

content: If you want to be happy, be.
author: Leo Tolstoy

content: What you seek is seeking you.
author: Rumi

content: Silence is a source of great strength.
author: Lao Tzu

content: The soul becomes dyed with the color of its thoughts.
author: Marcus Aurelius

content: He who is brave is free.
author: Seneca

content: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

content: There is no charm equal to tenderness of heart.
author: Jane Austen

content: What is important is seldom urgent and what is urgent is seldom important.

content: To love another person is to see the face of God.
author: Victor Hugo

content: The greatest remedy for anger is delay.
author: Seneca

content: The only journey is the one within.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

content: Action is the foundational key to all success.
author: Pablo Picasso

content: We suffer more often in imagination than in reality.
author: Seneca

content: Do what you feel in your heart to be right, for you’ll be criticized anyway.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

content: Where there is ruin, there is hope for a treasure.
author: Rumi

content: The greatest riches is contentment with little.
author: Plato

content: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
author: Benjamin Franklin

content: Adventure is worthwhile in itself.
author: Amelia Earhart

content: The power of the people is stronger than the people in power.
author: Wael Ghonim

content: The obstacle is the path.

content: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.

content: Life is the art of drawing without an eraser.

content: Courage is knowing what not to fear.
author: Plato

content: Wisdom begins in wonder.
author: Socrates

content: Patience is the companion of wisdom.

content: Books are a uniquely portable magic.
author: Stephen King

content: To teach is to learn twice.
author: Joseph Joubert

content: A certain darkness is needed to see the stars.

content: Well-being is attained little by little, and nevertheless is no little thing itself.

content: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become.

content: Be the hero of your own story.

content: The price of greatness is responsibility.
author: Winston Churchill

content: To understand everything is to forgive everything.

content: The most wasted of days is one without laughter.
author: Nicolas Chamfort

content: The desire to reach for the stars is ambitious. The desire to reach hearts is wise.
author: Maya Angelou

content: Faith is taking the first step even when you don’t see the whole staircase.

content: Effort is only effort when it begins to hurt.

content: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

content: Hope is a waking dream.
author: Aristotle

content: Your work is to discover your world and then with all your heart give yourself to it.
author: Buddha

content: The past beats inside me like a second heart.
author: John Banville

content: Do not fear mistakes. There are none.

content: The greatest gift you can give someone is your time.

content: Stars can’t shine without darkness.
author: Unknown

content: You can waste your lives drawing lines. Or you can live your life crossing them.

content: The brave may not live forever, but the cautious don’t live at all.

content: If you want to conquer the anxiety of life, live in the moment.
author: Alan Watts

content: We shape our tools and thereafter our tools shape us.
author: Marshall McLuhan

content: It is not length of life, but depth of life.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

content: Life must be understood backward. But it must be lived forward.
author: Søren Kierkegaard

content: The most difficult thing is the decision to act.
author: Amelia Earhart

content: He who dares, wins.
author: British Special Air Service

content: To think is easy. To act is hard.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

content: Wisdom is the daughter of experience.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

content: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
author: Robert H. Schuller

content: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

content: Persistence guarantees that results are inevitable.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

content: What consumes your mind controls your life.
author: Unknown

content: A day without laughter is a day wasted.
author: Charlie Chaplin

content: We do not learn from experience. We learn from reflecting on experience.
author: John Dewey

content: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
author: Aristotle

content: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
author: Carol Burnett

content: You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus.
author: Mark Twain

content: The wound is the place where the light enters you.

content: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
author: Aristotle

content: The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love.
author: Hubert H. Humphrey

content: Worrying is like paying a debt you don’t owe.
author: Mark Twain

content: Knowing is not enough; we must apply.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

content: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi
